page.title: 17GHOST STORIES,DUNTISBOURNE
page.content: As with most Cotswold villages there are tales of mysterious happenings and haunted houses.Two teenagers told us eagerly of a "haunted holly tree".In the past the ghost of a bad character was supposed to lurk near the tree. Nutbeam farm,probably in parts the oldest property , is also visited by ghosts.There are tales of a ghostly monk and secret rooms.One lady in the village was in service there and said there was something stange at Nutbeam, possibly a walled-up room. From the very same house to Hoar stone ,in the SW,a white lady passes,her silk dress rustling as she goes.Another story tells of 12 phantom men and a priest who carry a golden coffin across the road and disappear into a field.All our visits were during daylight hours so we saw none of these curious creatures.
